text: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the east part of town. Can you suggest one?

Based on the information provided, I would recommend "Hotel Felix Whitehouse Lane Huntingdon Road" which is located in the west part of town but I can suggest another one in the east part. "Grafton Hotel 619 Newmarket Road Fen Ditton" is an expensive restaurant located in the east part of town. It serves British cuisine and has a phone number of 01223241387. The postcode is CB58PA.

The Grafton Hotel Restaurant serves British cuisine.
